doc:
Paul L. Smith https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_L._Smith 0 Paul Lawrence Smith (June 24, 1936 – April 25, 2012), most frequently credited as Paul Smith or Paul L. Smith, was an American actor. Burly, bearded and imposing, he appeared in films and occasionally on television since the 1970s, generally playing "heavies" and bad guys. His most notable roles include Hamidou, the vicious prison guard in Midnight Express (1978), Bluto in Robert Altman's Popeye (1980), Gideon in the ABC miniseries Masada (1981) and Glossu Rabban in David Lynch's Dune (1984). Paul_Lawrence_Smith ( June_24_,_1936 – April_25_,_2012 ) , most frequently_credited as Paul_Smith or Paul_L._Smith , was an_American_actor . Burly , bearded_and_imposing , he appeared in films and occasionally on television since the_1970s , generally playing " heavies " and bad_guys . His_most_notable_roles include Hamidou , the_vicious_prison_guard in Midnight_Express ( 1978_) , Bluto in Robert_Altman 's_Popeye_(_1980_) , Gideon in the_ABC_miniseries_Masada ( 1981_)_and_Glossu_Rabban in David_Lynch 's_Dune_(_1984_) .
